Bad coding Practice: <font face="Arial">This text is in Arial font.</font>

correction:
.scrolling-text {animation: marquee-scroll-left 5s linear infinite;}
@keyframes marquee-scroll-left {from {transform: translateX(100%);} to {transform: translateX(-100%);}}

Bad coding Practice: Avoid hard-coding styles. Use a separate CSS file.
This heading has inline styles.
This text has multiple inline styles.
A div with inline background color and padding.
Centered and italicized paragraph.
Green link without underline.
Small and normal-weight text.
<button style="background-color: #3366cc; color: white;">Blue button with white text.</button>
Red and bold heading.
Div with specific top and bottom margins.
Uppercase text with increased letter spacing.
<font size="4" face="Verdana" color="#008000">Green text with specific size and font.</font>
Table with deprecated attributes.
Right-aligned paragraph with inline margin.
<marquee behavior="scroll" direction="left">Scrolling text with deprecated marquee tag.</marquee>
correction:
.scrolling-text {animation: marquee-scroll-left 5s linear infinite;}
@keyframes marquee-scroll-left {from {transform: translateX(100%);} to {transform: translateX(-100%);}}
